title: GlintCMS
short: The invisible Content Management System | an intesso open source project
text:
The Motivation to build GlintCMS was the frustration we had while developing Real Time Systems as well as more "Static" Platforms, that need to be rendered on the server side for Search Engine Optimization (SEO).

 

We switched between different technologies and monolyts, until we decided to build small modules, that we can reuse for web applications as well as for web sites.

 

It turned into a modular and flexible solution, that leaves you enough room for custom solutions for small to medium Web Sites.

It basically has no backend, but intuitive inline editing. It can run stuff on the server as well as in the browser.

 

Use Cases

  • Web Application (Single Page Applications)
  • Web Sites / Platforms (Heavy server side rendering)

 

Development Principle

GlintCMS follows the GlintAPP principle: github.com/glintapp/glintapp

 

Technology

  • Server: node.js / express or connect
  • Browser: huge lib support with browserify
  • Extendability: with "glint-*" npm modules
  • Data Store: supports almost everything with mimimal effort
  • Templating: supports everything that renders in node.js as well as in the browser
